verses.verse: יֹ֭שֵׁב <WH3427> Yo-shev He that dwelleth בְּסֵ֣תֶר <WH5643> be-Se-ter in the secret עֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon; place of the most High בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> be-Tzel under the shadow שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> Dai, of the Almighty יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃ <WH3885> yit-lo-Nan. shall abide

אֹמַ֗ר <WH559> 'o-Mar, I will say לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מַחְסִ֣י <WH4268> mach-Si [He is] my refuge וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י <WH4686> u-me-tzu-da-Ti; and my fortress אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai, my God אֶבְטַח־ <WH982> 'ev-tach- in him will I trust בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu who יַ֭צִּֽילְךָ <WH5337> Yatz-tzi-le-cha Surely he shall deliver מִפַּ֥ח <WH6341> mip-Pach thee from the snare יָק֗וּשׁ <WH3353> ya-Kush, of the fowler מִדֶּ֥בֶר <WH1698> mid-De-ver pestilence הַוּֽוֹת׃ <WH1942> hav-Vot. [and] from the noisome

בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ׀ <WH84> be-'ev-ra-To thee with his feathers יָ֣סֶךְ <WH5526> Ya-sech He shall cover לָ֭ךְ lach וְתַֽחַת־ <WH8478> ve-ta-chat- and under כְּנָפָ֣יו <WH3671> ke-na-Fav and under his wings תֶּחְסֶ֑ה <WH2620> tech-Seh; shalt thou trust צִנָּ֖ה <WH6793> tzin-Nah [shall be thy] shield וְֽסֹחֵרָ֣ה <WH5507> ve-so-che-Rah and buckler אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH571> a-mit-To. his truth

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not תִ֭ירָא <WH3372> Ti-ra Thou shalt not be afraid מִפַּ֣חַד <WH6343> mip-Pa-chad for the terror לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> La-ye-lah; by night מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ <WH2671> me-Chetz, [nor] for the arrow יָע֥וּף <WH5774> ya-'Uf [that] flieth יוֹמָֽם׃ <WH3119> yo-Mam. by day

מִ֭דֶּבֶר <WH1698> Mid-de-ver [Nor] for the pestilence בָּאֹ֣פֶל <WH652> ba-'O-fel in darkness יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <WH1980> ya-ha-Loch; [that] walketh מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב <WH6986> mik-Ke-tev, [nor] for the destruction יָשׁ֥וּד <WH7736> ya-Shud [that] wasteth צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> tzo-ho-Ra-yim. at noonday

יִפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> yip-Pol shall fall מִצִּדְּךָ֨׀ <WH6654> mitz-tzid-de-Cha at thy side אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, A thousand וּרְבָבָ֥ה <WH7233> u-re-va-Vah and ten thousand מִימִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> mi-mi-Ne-cha; at thy right hand אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha, about לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not יִגָּֽשׁ׃ <WH5066> yig-Gash. [but] it shall not come nigh

רַ֭ק <WH7535> rak with בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha Only with thine eyes תַבִּ֑יט <WH5027> tab-Bit; shalt thou behold וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת <WH8011> ve-shil-lu-Mat the reward רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> tir-'Eh. and see

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מַחְסִ֑י <WH4268> mach-Si; [which is] my refuge עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, [even] the most High שַׂ֣מְתָּ <WH7760> Sam-ta Because thou hast made מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <WH4583> me-'o-Ne-cha. thy habitation

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- No תְאֻנֶּ֣ה <WH579> te-'un-Neh befall אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah; There shall no evil וְ֝נֶ֗גַע <WH5061> ve-Ne-ga', thee neither shall any plague לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יִקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> yik-Rav come nigh בְּאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ <WH168> be-'o-ho-Le-cha. thy dwelling

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for מַ֭לְאָכָיו <WH4397> Mal-'a-chav For he shall give his angels יְצַוֶּה־ <WH6680> ye-tzav-veh- charge לָּ֑ךְ Lach; לִ֝שְׁמָרְךָ֗ <WH8104> lish-ma-re-cha, over thee to keep בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1870> de-ra-Chei-cha. thee in all thy ways

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in כַּפַּ֥יִם <WH3709> kap-Pa-yim in [their] hands יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ <WH5375> yis-sa-'U-ne-cha; They shall bear thee up פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- not תִּגֹּ֖ף <WH5062> tig-Gof lest thou dash בָּאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> ba-'E-ven against a stone רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH7272> rag-Le-cha. thy foot

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon שַׁ֣חַל <WH7826> Sha-chal upon the lion וָפֶ֣תֶן <WH6620> va-Fe-ten and adder תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ <WH1869> tid-Roch; Thou shalt tread תִּרְמֹ֖ס <WH7429> tir-Mos shalt thou trample under feet כְּפִ֣יר <WH3715> ke-Fir the young lion וְתַנִּֽין׃ <WH8577> ve-tan-Nin. and the dragon

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki Because בִ֣י vi חָ֭שַׁק <WH2836> Cha-shak Because he hath set his love וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <WH6403> va-'a-fal-le-Te-hu; upon me therefore will I deliver אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ <WH7682> 'a-sag-ge-Ve-hu, him I will set him on high כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> ya-Da' because he hath known שְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> she-Mi. my name

יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי׀ <WH7121> yik-ra-'E-ni He shall call וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ <WH6030> ve-'e-'e-Ne-hu, upon me and I will answer עִמּֽוֹ־ <WH5973> 'im-mov- will be with אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi him בְצָרָ֑ה <WH6869> ve-tza-Rah; him I [will be] with him in trouble אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ <WH2502> 'a-chal-le-Tze-hu, I will deliver וַֽאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃ <WH3513> Va-'a-chab-be-De-hu. him and honour

אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech With long יָ֭מִים <WH3117> Ya-mim life אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ <WH7646> 'as-bi-'E-hu; will I satisfy וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ <WH7200> ve-'ar-'E-hu, him and shew בִּֽישׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <WH3444> Bi-shu-'a-Ti. him my salvation
